titleStmt.title: His Majesties gracious speech to both Houses of Parliament, on Tuesday, July 30. 1661. The day of their adjournment. : Together with the speech of Sir Edward Turnor, Knight, speaker of the honorable House of Commons, to the Kings Most Excellent Majesty. Delivered on Tuesday the thirtieth day of Juy, 1661 at the adjournment of the Parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)

titleStmt.title: His Majesties gracious speech to both Houses of Parliament, on Tuesday, July 30. 1661.
